all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And inasmuch as they were humble they might be made strong, and blessed from on high, and receive knowledge from time to time.
Doctrine and Covenants 1:28
Quote of the Day
"As we turn to the Savior, He can … help us respond to our trials in a way that facilitates our spiritual progression."
Aroldo B. Cavalcante | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
